decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Unnumbered Block Plan, 2140-01, 2140-02, Flood Risk Assessment, Unnumbered Location Plan, Received: 17/05/2017. 2140-09 Rev C, 2140-10 Rev C, Received: 27/07/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - The window formed in the side elevation on the first floor of the two storey side extension shall be obscure glazed, hinged to open inwards and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.
description: Erection of a two storey side extension with one additional  front and a side roof window and a single storey rear extension to the house (amended plans)
